title: Development of the HACCP Plan
description: Requirements for HACCP plan development including team formation, training documentation, product descriptions, process flow diagrams, and hazard analysis preparation

requirements.question: Is there a team responsible for the HACCP system at the operation, with an assigned leader for the development, implementation and on-going maintenance of the HACCP system?
Is there documented evidence that the HACCP team members have been trained on HACCP principles?
Does a product description exist for the products produced?
Has the process(es) been flow charted in sufficient detail to completely describe the process or product handling/processing steps?
Is there documented evidence that the flow chart(s) has been verified on-site?
